categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Agent Limeren was a male Human who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War, working as a member of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order. Limeren later transferred to the Destabilization Branch of Imperial Intelligence and after being surgically-altered to give him the appearance of a Mon Calamari, he traveled to the planet of Mon Calamari and participated in the Calamari Project, an Imperial operation that aimed to cause a war between the Mon Calamari and Quarren species.
